```js
class HorizontalLinearStepperExample extends React.Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super(props);
    this.state = {
      steps: ["Select campaign settings", "Create an ad group", "Create an ad"],
      activeStep: 0,
      finished: false
    };
  }

  render() {
    return (
      <React.Fragment>
        <HorizontalLinearStepper {...this.state} />

        <Button
          disabled={this.state.activeStep === 0}
          onClick={() =>
            this.setState({ activeStep: this.state.activeStep - 1 })
          }
        >
          Back
        </Button>

        <Button
          disabled={this.state.activeStep === 2}
          onClick={() =>
            this.setState({ activeStep: this.state.activeStep + 1 })
          }
        >
          Next
        </Button>

        <Button
          onClick={() => this.setState({ activeStep: 2, finished: true })}
        >
          Finish
        </Button>
      </React.Fragment>
    );
  }
}

<HorizontalLinearStepperExample />;
```
